a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Household air pollution deaths by region
Annual number of premature deaths attributed to household air pollution from the use of solid fuels for cooking
and heating. Solid fuels include the use of crop wastes, dung, charcoal and coal for indoor cooking.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
